column1: Uchi////Uchi thinks they are way to popular and can give attitude. Uchi can keep their attitude at the door.  Ms. Attitude host allowed us to walk out of Uchi and down to AQUI.  Aqui has great food and the staff didn't have attitude. Watch out Uchi as attitude will drive your neighborhood customers elsewhere especially during the weekday as they won't be at Uchiattitude!
